page.title: 04MACKEREL MARKETING,ULLAPOOL.
page.content: There are 2 distinct mackerel outlets: a) 1/3 is sold by quay-side auction for home and Continental buyers and some trucked to Holland,France,Spain and Italy. b) The rest to the klondyker fleet at a lower price. A few foreign ships are 'floating freezers'under charter to U.K.firms. Some buy direct from catchers or local fish buyers.Fish is frozen or fully processed aboard these ships. Since 1981 there has been a change of pattern in the movement of the shoals from The Minch > Atlantic to the far north of the Scottish mainland (Rona, Flannan Is.and St.Kilda) > Atlantic.If this continues,the major mackerel operation could be transferred to the west coast of Harris.
